俯仰.definition: lowering and raising of the head; (fig.) small move; pitch (position angle)

俯就.definition: to deign; to condescend; to yield to (entreaties); to submit to (sb); (polite) to deign to accept (a post)

俯拾即是.definition: see 俯拾皆是[fu3 shi2 jie1 shi4]

俯拾皆是.definition: lit. so numerous that one could just bend down and pick them up (idiom); fig. extremely common; easily available

俯瞰.definition: to look down at (from a high vantage point)

俯衝.definition: to dive down fast; to swoop down

俯視.definition: to overlook; to look down at

俯身.definition: to lean over; to bend over; to stoop; to bow

俯首帖耳.definition: bowed head and ears glued (idiom); docile and obedient; at sb's beck and call
